explanation: [0-0] A young man in a green shirt is sitting on an airplane, wearing glasses and looking forward. His right arm is raised, with his index finger extended and his mouth slightly open. He has a silver bracelet on his right wrist and is holding a pink neck pillow on his lap with his left hand.

[0-4] Then, the young man in the green shirt extends his right index finger to his mouth, then waves his hand, and then leans forward slightly. As the man moves, the camera also moves to the right, showing a woman sitting in the seat in front. The man raises his right hand and pats the woman's head, then quickly withdraws it. The woman in front is wearing a light green dress, and she looks back with a puzzled expression on her face.
